protocol.name: P-G8745-1
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days on soil in 100¼molm-2s-1 of white light (R:FR 4.4) at 16 degrees.

protocol.name: P-G8745-3
text: Labelling was carried out by the John Innes Centre Genome Laboratory (

protocol.name: P-G8745-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted from cotyledon (and a small amount of hypocotyl) tissue using RNeasy kits (Qiagen) followed by extraction with acid phenol chloroform and precipitation with ethanol to a concentration > 3mg/ml.

protocol.name: P-G8745-5
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days on soil in 100¼molm-2s-1 of white light (R:FR 4.4) at 22 degrees.

protocol.name: P-G8745-6
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 4 days on soil in 100¼molm-2s-1 of white light (R:FR 4.4) at 16 degrees before transfer to low R:FR (R:FR 0.1) for 24 h.

protocol.name: P-G8745-7
protocol.text: 4-day-old seedlings were treated with low R:FR (0.1) for 24 h before harvesting

protocol.name: P-G8745-8
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 4 days on soil in 100¼molm-2s-1 of white light (R:FR 4.4) at 22 degrees before transfer to low R:FR (R:FR 0.1) for 24 h.
